name: Subacute Thyroiditis
chief_complaint: I've had a sore throat and neck pain for weeks, and I feel feverish and tired all the time
prognosis: Self-limiting condition typically resolving within 3-6 months, though may progress through hyperthyroid, hypothyroid, then recovery phases
description: Post-viral inflammatory thyroid condition causing thyroid hormone leakage, often following upper respiratory infection. Characterized by painful thyroid and transient thyrotoxicosis.
